Our Services


Partnering with MagBen gives you exclusive access to any of our top-notch customer-centric services. Our services include:

Auto-Services

We carry out electrical and mechanical repair of all types of modern computerized vehicles.

Auto-Training

As a way of giving back to the society and protecting the future of the Nigeria automotive industry, we offer limited slots to interested and qualified trainees.

What You Get

Asides from the ecstatic MagBen experience, you also get:

Quality and reliable services

101% value for your money.

Swift and time efficient service delivery.

Quality and genuine satisfaction.
